item.description: Citrix CDM file transfer optimization is enabled on CGP connections

item.description: Citrix Multi-Port feature is enabled

item.name: enable_small_pkts
item.description: Citrix small packets optimization is enabled

item.description: Reject non-cached Citrix CGP REQs

item.description: The Citrix protocol blade will not use the secure inner channel

item.name: enable_secure_inner_channel_strict_drop
item.nicename: Citrix Secure Inner Channel Strict Drop
item.description: Citrix connections are dropped if the secure inner channel cannot be established

item.name: min_buffer_prio
item.description: The Nagle algorithm will be applied to Citrix connections with this priority level or any lower priority level

item.description: Citrix print optimization type

item.name: file_buffer_size
item.description: The number of file buffer blocks used during Citrix CDM file transfer optimization

item.name: small_pkts_threshold
item.description: Citrix small packets optimization applies to packets whose size is at most this many bytes

item.description: Object Prefetch Table cache mode

item.description: Kerberos Authentication Support

item.name: vsp_status
item.values: 0: 1:available 2:creating\ disks 3:installing 4:initializing 5:invalid\ ESXi\ password 6:disconnected 7:lockdown\ mode 8:powering\ off 9:powered\ off 10:pushing\ configs 11:not\ installed 12:failed\ creating\ disks 13:failed\ installation 14:failed\ initial\ config 15:failed\ restart\ (vsp\ not\ installed) 16:failed\ restart\ (stop\ timed\ out) 17:failed\ restart\ (start\ timed\ out) 18:unknown
